epic.title: Notifications & Alerts
epic.summary: Comprehensive notification and alert system for system events and patient communications across multiple channels to ensure timely information delivery and improved engagement.
epic.businessOverview: Comprehensive notification and alert system for system events and patient communications across multiple channels to ensure timely information delivery and improved engagement. The system provides real-time alerts for critical clinical events, automated patient notifications for appointments and care activities, and system-wide announcements to keep all stakeholders informed and engaged.
epic.technicalArchitecture:
## Technical Architecture Components

- Multi-channel notification service (SMS, email, push, WhatsApp)
- Alert routing and prioritization engine
- Template management system
- Delivery tracking and analytics
- Notification preference management
- Real-time event monitoring
epic.implementationTimeline:
## Implementation Timeline

**Week 1:**
- Notification service setup and channel integration

**Week 2:**
- Alert rules and routing configuration

**Week 3:**
- Patient notification templates and preferences

**Week 4:**
- Testing and delivery optimization
epic.caseStudyReference:
## Case Study Reference

**Community Health Center**

- **Challenge:** Low appointment show rates, missed critical alerts
- **Outcome:** 30% reduction in no-shows, 100% critical alert delivery rate

stories.title: Critical lab result alerts
stories.description: Send immediate alerts to providers when critical lab results are received to ensure timely clinical intervention and patient safety.

stories.title: Prescription refill requests
stories.description: Notify providers and pharmacy staff when patients request prescription refills to facilitate timely processing and medication access.

stories.title: Claim denial notifications
stories.description: Alert billing staff when insurance claims are denied to enable prompt follow-up and resolution of payment issues.

stories.title: Credential expiration warnings
stories.description: Send warnings to staff and administrators when credentials (licenses, certifications, insurance) are approaching expiration to ensure compliance and prevent service disruptions.

stories.title: System maintenance announcements
stories.description: Broadcast system maintenance announcements to all users to inform them of scheduled downtime and service interruptions.

stories.title: Appointment reminders (SMS, email, WhatsApp)
stories.description: Send appointment reminders via SMS, email, and WhatsApp to reduce no-shows and improve appointment attendance rates.

stories.title: Lab results available notifications
stories.description: Notify patients when lab results are available for review through patient portal or secure messaging to improve patient engagement and care transparency.

stories.title: Prescription ready for pickup
stories.description: Send notifications to patients when prescriptions are ready for pickup at the pharmacy to improve medication adherence and patient convenience.

stories.title: Outstanding balance reminders
stories.description: Send reminders to patients about outstanding balances to improve collection rates and reduce accounts receivable aging.

stories.title: Health maintenance reminders (annual physical due)
stories.description: Send proactive health maintenance reminders such as annual physical due dates to support preventive care and care gap closure.
